p.k: The prawn is all its forms
p.d: The prawn no longer enjoys the status it once had. From being a delicacy only twenty years ago, this little shellfish has become a basic commodity eaten by everyone, on every occasion and sometimes every day. Today it is the most-eaten seafood in France, far ahead of fish. Guests: Théo Couedel, fisherman-skipper; Denis Serenne, oyster-grower; Yvon Serenne, champion oyster-eater. Presented by: Marine Barnérias.
